column2: All learning materials for learning materials

- Task Completion (5%): Frequently absent or disengaged, does not participate in discussions or tasks, and fails to complete assignments.

- Culture Code (0%):
Fails to demonstrate Ownership, Integrity, or Collaboration.

- Attendance (0%): MIA
column3:
- Task Completion (5%): Attends most sessions but shows limited participation, rarely engages in discussions, and partially completes tasks.

- Culture Code (5%): Needs improvement in Engagement and aligning with Culture Code.

- Attendance (0%): MC/EL/UPL
(except immediate family bereavement)
column4:
- Task Completion (5%): Participates regularly, asks some questions, contributes to discussions, and completes most tasks with consistent effort.

- Culture Code (10%): Reflects Integrity, Collaboration, and Focus on Impact.

- Attendance (0%): with Lateness
column5:
- Task Completion (5%):  Fully engaged in all sessions, asks insightful questions, contributes meaningfully to discussions, completes all tasks with high quality, and shows enthusiasm and initiative.

- Culture Code (10%): Exemplifies Ownership, Collaboration, and Continuous Learning.

- Attendance (5%) : Perfect Attendance
